title.rendered: “IDF Fallen Soldiers Identified: Updates on Casualties from Recent Gaza Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson about the names of the two IDF fallen soldiers that the news has been delivered to their families:
https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC261220238498759302

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where their details and pictures are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, two infantrymen from the 82nd Battalion and an officer in the 75th Battalion, Golan ‘Saar’ Formation (7), were severely injured yesterday in a battle in the southern Gaza Strip.

In addition, an infantryman (res.) from Battalion 6646, ‘Foxes of the Heights’ Formation (646), was severely injured yesterday in a battle in the northern Gaza Strip.

All the soldiers were evacuated to receive medical treatment in a hospital, their families have been updated.
